oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WWVA Jamboree performances - WWVA - 1947-01-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded performances from the WWVA Jamboree, featuring Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy and Hank Snow, recorded on January 30, 1947 on radio station WWVA (Wheeling, W. Va).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Foolish Quarrels (Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy) [unconfirmed] -- [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- I Want A Pardon For Daddy (Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy) -- [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- I Believe I'm Entitled To You (Hank Snow and Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy) - [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- Jesus Hold My Hand ([Unidentified]) -- [Unidentified] talks and reads either a poem or a prayer
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WWVA (Radio station : Wheeling, W. Va.); Big Slim, 1903-1966; Snow, Hank;
